pullRequest.title: DB-9846 Spark 3.0 Migrate minor API changes

commit.message: DB-9846 Spark 3.0 Migrate minor API changes
DB-9846 custom platform dependent class fix

nodes.bodyText: sure we need this additional dependency?

for other reviewers: underlying change here is that Spark2.4 uses encoder.toRow(valueRow); , while Spark3.0 uses return encoder.createSerializer().apply(valueRow); . see hbase_sql/orc-spark-3.0/src/main/java/com/splicemachine/stream/output/ParquetWriterFactoryImpl.java and 2.4
@OlegMazurov  might want to have a look at these configs.

nodes.bodyText: LOG.isDebugEnabled() -- the parameter is always computed even when debug logging is disabled
Let's keep all yarn-site.xml in sync. If we decide to change some parameters for ITs/standalone that should be done in a separate JIRA.

nodes.bodyText: Copying Oleg's comment so that it doesn't get lost: Add a comment to the dependency mentioning the required annotation to help future developers
